config.hats.cat.hatRandomisation.name: Hat Randomisation
config.hats.cat.hatRandomisation.desc: Options for the randomisation of hats.
config.hats.cat.others.name: Other Options
config.hats.cat.others.desc: Options that don't really fit anywhere else.
config.hats.prop.maxHatRenders.name: Max Hat Renders
config.hats.prop.maxHatRenders.desc: Maximum number of hats to render in one frame.
config.hats.prop.hatChance.name: Hat Spawn Chance
config.hats.prop.hatChance.desc:
For Client Config: Spawn chance when on servers that do not have Hats installed.
For Server Config: Spawn chance for entities which support hats.
config.hats.prop.hatUnlockString.name: Hat Unlocked Message
config.hats.prop.hatUnlockString.desc: The Toast title when a hat/accessory is unlocked. 0 = Random, 1 = Hat Unlocked, 2 = New Hat, 3 = Hat Acquired, 4 = Hat Collected, 5 = Hat Get
config.hats.prop.guiMinecraftStyle.name: Render GUI in Minecraft Style
config.hats.prop.guiMinecraftStyle.desc: Do we render the GUI in Minecraft Style (as opposed to Boxes & Stuff style)? 1 = Vanilla Style, 2 = Texture Pack Style
config.hats.prop.guiAnimationTime.name: GUI Animation Time
config.hats.prop.guiAnimationTime.desc: The time (in ticks) for most of the GUI animations. Set to 1 if you want to practically skip animation.
config.hats.prop.shownTutorial.name: Shown GUI Tutorial
config.hats.prop.shownTutorial.desc: Have we shown the GUI tutorial? (Set to true to skip it)
config.hats.prop.newHatToast.name: New Hat Toast
config.hats.prop.forceRenderToasts.name: Force Render Toasts
config.hats.prop.forceRenderToasts.desc: The Fancy Hat Selector GUI hides the game GUI. This disables toast rendering. Force the toast render after our UI renders?
config.hats.prop.forceGuiFallback.name: Force GUI Fallback
config.hats.prop.forceGuiFallback.desc: Don't like the camera spinning out when you choose a hat? Turn this on to force the in-screen entity render, always. Holding Control/Command when opening the GUI also forces this.
config.hats.prop.disableHatNameRenderInH: Disable Hat Name Render in Hat Selector
Lagging? This might help give you back some frames.
config.hats.prop.invisibleEntityInHatSel: Lagging? This might help give you back some frames.
config.hats.prop.hatLauncherRandomHatSpe: Hat Launcher - Random Hat Cycle Speed
On a "Random Hat" option for the Hat Launcher, a new hat shows every X ticks. Increase this to slow down the cycle.
config.hats.prop.filterSorterConfig.name: Hat Sorter Config
config.hats.prop.filterSorterConfig.desc: The config for the Hat Sorter. Please don't edit this by hand, do it through the Hats UI.
config.hats.prop.randSeed.name: Random Seed for Hat Randomisation
config.hats.prop.randSeed.desc: Random Seed used for Hat Randomisation, rarity, spawn chance, etc. Leave blank for random generated seed.
config.hats.prop.entityOverrideChance.de: Entity chance override. Each entry should be a resource location and a chance, separated by a comma. EG: "minecraft:pig,100" will make all minecraft pigs have a 100 percent chance of having a hat.
config.hats.prop.disabledMobs.name: Disabled Mobs
config.hats.prop.disabledMobs.desc: Resource Location to disable hats on certain mobs. EG: minecraft:pig
config.hats.prop.rarityWeight.name: Rarity Weight
config.hats.prop.rarityWeight.desc: The weight of each of the spawn chance and rarity allocation of hats, in the order of Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic, Legendary. Any lacking values are filled in with 0s, extra values discarded.
config.hats.prop.rarityCost.name: Value of Hat by Rarity
config.hats.prop.rarityCost.desc: The Value (in HATs) of a Hat by rarity.
config.hats.prop.bossHatChanceBonus.name: Boss Hat Spawn Chance Bonus
config.hats.prop.bossHatChanceBonus.desc: The bonus spawn chance of a boss to spawn a hat, in addition to the hatChance config.
config.hats.prop.bossRarityBonus.name: Boss Hat Rarity Bonus
config.hats.prop.bossRarityBonus.desc: The bonus to the rarity of hats spawned on bosses. EG: setting this to 1 (max) will force Bosses to only spawn with Legendary hats, should the weight be allocated correctly.
config.hats.prop.allowFileTransfer.name: Allow File Transfer
config.hats.prop.allowFileTransfer.desc: Allow sending of hat files between clients and servers?
config.hats.prop.accessoryCostMultiplier: Accessories have their own rarity. This multiplies their value by their rarity set in rarityCost
config.hats.prop.salesCostMultiplier.des: (Not currently used, for Hat Trader update) Hats sold by the Hat Trader (planned) cost this times more than their normal value.
config.hats.prop.enabledGuiStyle.name: Enabled Hat Selector GUI Style
config.hats.prop.enabledGuiStyle.desc: 0 = Disable Hat Selector, 1 = Only allow the fallback (entity on screen) render of the Hat Selector, 2 = Allow full hat selector GUI
config.hats.prop.sendNewHatToastPrompt.d: Do we want to send clients a toast prompt for a new hat?
config.hats.prop.enableCreativeModeHatHu: By default, Creative Mode players have access to all hats. Turning this on forces them to hunt for hats as if they were in Survival/Adventure
config.hats.prop.mobHatTakeover.name: Mob Hat Takeover
config.hats.prop.mobHatTakeover.desc: If a mob (without a hat) kills another mob (with a hat), will it get the other mob's hat?
config.hats.prop.hatEntityLifespan.name: Hat Entity Lifespan
config.hats.prop.hatEntityLifespan.desc: The lifespan (in ticks) of the Hat Entity from the Hat Launcher. Be mindful this resets when a hat entity swaps out hats with another mob.
config.hats.prop.hatLauncherReplacesPlay: Hat Launcher Can Replace Player Hat
Turning this off prevents the Hat Launcher from replacing a player's hat.
config.hats.prop.hatLauncherDoesNotRemov: Hat Launcher Does Not Remove Hat From Inventory
Disabling this knocks your hat off as if you were another mob, and also removes your worn hat from your inventory. Only applies when the player is using a Hat Inventory
commands.hats.setHat.success: 成功为%s个实体更新帽子
commands.hats.clear.success: 成功移除了所有%s的帽子，开心吗？
commands.hats.reextract.success: 成功提取并重载了%s个文件
commands.hats.reextract.failed: 未能提取并重载文件。有关更多信息，请查看服务器控制台
hats.toast.clientOnly.title: 缺少服务器环境！
hats.toast.clientOnly.subtitle:
我们发现服务器似乎并没有装载这个模组

仅客户端使用模式开启
hats.toast.sync.title: 显示错误
hats.toast.sync.subtitle: 请尝试同步服务器帽子资源
hats.toast.sync.receivedHat: 接收到服务器发送的帽子资源
hats.gui.selection.title: 帽子菜单
hats.gui.window.hat.noHat: 找不到帽子？请检查你的帽子过滤器
hats.gui.window.hatsList.title: 你的帽子
hats.gui.window.allHats.title: 所有帽子的种类
hats.gui.window.sorter.title: 帽子过滤器及分类器
hats.gui.window.management.title: 帽子管理
hats.gui.tutorial.title: 教程
hats.gui.tutorial.toast.title: 打开你的帽子列表
hats.gui.tutorial.toast.subtitle: 按下["%s"]键
hats.gui.tutorial.intro: 你想开始本模组的界面教学吗？
hats.gui.tutorial.noHat:
哦，似乎你还没有获取帽子

我们已向服务器发送了给你帽子的请求

别担心，我包了！
hats.gui.tutorial.camera:
你可以用鼠标调整左边的展示栏

点击、拖动，使用鼠标滚轮都是可行的

来试试吧！
hats.gui.tutorial.cameraFallback:
你可以用鼠标调整左边的展示栏

你可以点击、拖动，使用鼠标滚轮，但是我们可以慢慢来，不着急
hats.gui.tutorial.hatsHere:
你解锁的帽子都在这里

（现在别点哦，不然你会退出教程的）
hats.gui.tutorial.clickForHatMissing:
你现在应该有帽子了，但是我们似乎找不到它

也许你的过滤器隐藏了它？

不管怎样...
hats.gui.tutorial.clickForHat: 你可以左键帽子来穿戴它，也可以右键查看更多选项
hats.gui.tutorial.search:
你可以在此搜索特定帽子

你还可以右键清空搜索框
hats.gui.tutorial.additionalButtons:
更多按钮在这儿

把光标移动到按钮处以查看提示信息
hats.gui.tutorial.dragBar:
需要更多空间来看你的帽子？

把这个拖到左边
hats.gui.tutorial.conclusion:
就是这样！

感谢游玩帽子模组！
hats.gui.tutorial.skip: 你可以随时再次开启教学
hats.gui.sorter.filterContributor.name: 贡献者
hats.gui.sorter.filterHas.name: 不在物品栏里
hats.gui.sorter.filterNotFavourite.name: 没有喜爱的
hats.gui.sorter.filterUndiscovered.name: 没有已解锁的
hats.gui.sorter.sorterAlphabetical.name: 按字母排序
hats.gui.sorter.sorterCount.name: 按数量
hats.gui.sorter.sorterDiscovered.name: 按已解锁
hats.gui.sorter.sorterFavourite.name: 按喜好
hats.gui.sorter.sorterRarity.name: 按稀有度
hats.gui.tooltip.author: 由%s制作

hats.advancement.killBossWithHat.title: 这个最好是更稀有的...
hats.advancement.killBossWithHat.descrip:
击杀boss生物，获得它的帽子

解锁帽子发射器合成配方
hats.advancement.craftHatLauncher.title: 所以这看起来像是...衬衫发射器？
hats.advancement.craftHatLauncher.descri:
也许帽子也能用？

（制作一个帽子发射器）
hats.advancement.changeMobHat.title: 给你的！
hats.advancement.changeMobHat.descriptio:
你也一样！

每个人都有！

（用帽子发射器给生物戴上帽子）
hats.advancement.rogueHat.title: 流氓帽子怎么样...
hats.advancement.rogueHat.description: 让你自己的帽子被流氓帽子打掉
hats.advancement.pigChunHat.title: 感谢Dev
hats.advancement.pigChunHat.description: 给一只猪带上帽子并命名为iChun
hats.advancement.wearHat.title: 潮流领军人
hats.advancement.wearHatWithAccessory.de: 戴上一个带有附件的帽子
hats.advancement.colouriseHat.title: 时尚达人
hats.advancement.colouriseHat.descriptio: 改变帽子的颜色并戴上它
hats.advancement.hatWithThreeOrMoreAcces: 拥有一个有多个附件的帽子
hats.advancement.accessoryInAccessory.de:
...就像是附件

我们把附件加入了自定义界面，由此你可以自定义自己的帽子

（在自定义界面给帽子安装附件）
hats.advancement.nonVanillaHat.title: 等等，这不是原版来的！
hats.advancement.nonVanillaHat.descripti: 从非原版生物上获取帽子
